definition: clearly revealed to the mind or the senses or judgment, a document granting an inventor sole rights to an invention, make open to sight or notice
details:
adjective
- clearly revealed to the mind or the senses or judgment
= synonyms: plain
- (of a bodily tube or passageway) open
noun
- a document granting an inventor sole rights to an invention
= synonyms: patent of invention
- an official document granting a right or privilege
= synonyms: letters patent
verb
- make open to sight or notice
= example: make open to sight or notice
- obtain a patent for
= example: obtain a patent for
- grant rights to
= example: grant rights to
